name: Egg Rage
description:
Egg Rage


«Hey you fucker! Don't look at me like that ... fine, I'll beat the shit out of you»

CONDITIONS
-Pea inflicts damage by touching you;
-Large peas can throw small peas at you;
-You cannot shoot in all directions, the sight is needed as an indicator of the shooting mode;
-In shooting mode, you are slower;
-You do melee damage only if you look towards the enemy;
-You can break the bastard's head if he is lying on the ground;
- You're just fucking furious and cool.

CONTROLS
WASD - movement;
Space - roll / dash (temporarily works incorrectly);
Right Mouse Button Pressed - shooting mode;
Clicking the left mouse button in the shooting mode - shot;
E - FATALITY!;

R - restart;
Backspace - spawn enemies.

UNITY DEVELOPERS
Roman Chirkov 
Richard Wood

CONCEPT/GAME DESIGN/ART
Daniil Shekin
